verses.text: Ex wuninal, chaec eyab' in lolonel swala'. Maclejec eyab'i yic wach' ol jelanb'oc he pensar yuj.
Ha k'ayb'ub'al te wach' swak' t'ayex, yuj chi' tzeyailejnhej t'a masanil tiempo.
Ayic quelem unin in, ayinto ek' t'a yol spat in mam, yelxo wal xajanab'il in yuj ix in nun.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi', icha tik ajnac yak'an in k'ayb'ub'al winh in mam. Yalannac winh icha tik: Sik'kan in lolonel tik t'a a pensar, k'anab'ajej tas swal tik, yic wach' ay a k 'inal.
Cha a jelanil yet' a wach' pensaril, manh ak'b'at in lolonel tik satk'olal.
Xajanej a jelanil, manh a patiquejeli, yujto ol ach colchaj yuj.
Yowalil tza sayek' jelanil t'a junjun k'u. Wach'chom ajaltac tz'aj yilchaj uuj, palta te wach' ama tato a tza b'ab'laj sayejek' t'a yichanh juntzanhxo tas ay t'ayach.
Nib'ejoch jelanil, yic wach' ol ach ik'jocchaanh yuj, yic wach' niwan ol aj elk'och t'a yol sat heb' etanimail.
Ha yuj jelanil chi', wach' ol ach elk'ochoc, ol och k'elan heb' anima yuj a jelanil chi', xchikan winh in mam chi' t'ayin.
Axo ticnaik ach wuninal, cha wal ab' juntzanh in lolonel tik, yic wach' ol najatb'oc a k 'inal.
Ha in ol ach wik' b'ey t'a sb'eyb'al heb' jelan, ol wak'an a b'eyb'alej tojolal.
Ha t'a tojol b'eyb'al chi', malaj tas ol ach yamanoch waan, wach'chom yelk'olal ol ach b'atoc, palta manh ol ach telwoclaj.
Ak'och a pensar t'a k'ayb'ub'al tik, manh a patiquejeli. Yelxo wal tza b'eyb'alej yic wach' ay a k 'inal.
Manh ach b'at tzak'an t'a spatic heb' chuk sb'eyb'al, manh a k'ulej icha tas sk'ulej heb'.
B'esel a b'ha t'a skal heb', ak' ip a b'eyb'alan wach'il.
Max ochlaj swayanh heb' tato max sk'ulej chukal heb', max yik'laj yip heb', tato malaj junok mach syixtej heb'.
Ha chukal yet' ixtoj anima, a juntzanh chi' swael heb' yaji.
Ha sb'eyb'al heb' tojol spensar, lajan icha ayic wanto sakb'i masanto sk'e k'u, scheclaj spatic yichanh heb' yuj.
Axo sb'eyb'al heb' chuk spensar jun, lajan icha yic tzonh b'eyek' t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, manh chequeloc b'aj sko tenoch coc.
Ach wuninal, cha ab' in lolonel tik, maclej wal ab' sik'lab'il.
Mokab' ik'el a sat t'ay, sik'kan t'a a pensar,
yujto a juntzanh lolonel tik tz'ak'an sk'inal heb' tz'ilchaj yuj.
Tza ya'ilej a pensar t'a yichanh masanil tastac ay t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, yujto a a pensar chi' tzach cuchb'an t'a wach'il, ma t'a chukal.
Manh esalwumoc tzutej a b'a, manh a comon alej pax chukal lolonel.
Te tojolnhej tzach b'at t'a ichanh t'a sb'eal wach'il, manh ach b'at k'elan t'a tas malaj swach'il.
Tza ya'ilej wal tas tza k'ulej icha wal ko sik'lan ko b'e b'aj tzonh b'eyi, aokab' wal sb'eal wach'il b'aj tzach ochi.
Manh ach elkan t'a jun b'e te tojol, manh ach b'atkan t'a sb'eal chukal.
